title: Old Habits
description: When Stoce, street thief, was hired to steal the Agrandon gems, he thought it would be an easy job. Before long, the gems are out of his hands, the local crime lord thinks he's trying to steal them, and the streets are full of assassins after Stoce's head.Following the gems, Stoce finds himself in another land, in a castle with a new partner. A pair of wizards, a paladin, and castle full of soldiers and guards later, Stoce ends up the only one that can foil a devious plot that could cost him his life.
author: Christopher R.  Taylor
